body_html: @fmassa Thank you! I am sorry that I missed that pull request. Seems like it's covering roughly the same problem. The reviewers concern was that making an datapoint as a working unit instead of a batch could incur extra memory copying, which both pull requests are suffering from. Because it seems this issue hasn't been solved, I would want to revamp my implementation and make a new suggestion if it's not offending anyone.
